project.projtitle: Design and evaluation of wireless systems in Supply Chain Management
project.funding_programme: Programme for Education and Initial Vocational Training II (EPEAEK II) - Action 2.2.3.b - Iraklitos research fellowships at the Athens University of Economics and Business
project.description: In urban freight movement a good, near-optimal, distribution plan is necessary but not sufficient for high performance distribution. This is mainly due to the probabilistic factors that urban movement depends on, such as high levels of traffic congestion, negative environmental impact, tight delivery time windows, vehicle breakdowns, unexpected events and so on.We propose a dynamic vehicle management system that monitors distribution vehicles in real-time and recommends intelligent re-routing interventions that minimize the adverse impact of unforeseen events on the entire system
